front.title: Basic Transition Mechanisms for IPv6 Hosts and Routers

abstract.t: This document specifies IPv4 compatibility mechanisms that can beimplemented by IPv6 hosts and routers. These mechanisms includeproviding complete implementations of both versions of the InternetProtocol (IPv4 and IPv6), and tunneling IPv6 packets over IPv4routing infrastructures. They are designed to allow IPv6 nodes tomaintain complete compatibility with IPv4, which should greatlysimplify the deployment of IPv6 in the Internet, and facilitate theeventual transition of the entire Internet to IPv6.
